rulesStrings.li: quality_line->It reframes the space around the band.
quality_line->Time seems to slow inside the groove.
quality_line->Every note lands with intent and grace.
quality_line->Air and weight move together as one.
quality_line->The room itself feels like an instrument.
quality_line->Intensity never costs clarity.
quality_line->It carries the hush of a great hall.
quality_line->Focus is razor sharp yet never brittle.
quality_line->The mix disappears and only the music remains.
quality_line->Tiny sounds feel vast, vast sounds feel close.
quality_line->It turns momentum into memory.
quality_line->You hear decisions, not accidents.
quality_line->It feels like a place you could walk into.
quality_line->A summation of craft at the highest level.
production_quality->Iconic balance that defines a standard.
production_quality->Imaging is holographic and immovable.
production_quality->Dynamics read like human breath.
production_quality->Color and contrast are perfectly judged.
production_quality->Silence is used as a musical element.
production_quality->Impact arrives with zero smear.
production_quality->Depth extends well beyond the speakers.
production_quality->The result is archival and timeless.
